lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 2 (AP) -- The War Office disclosed tonight that the Vice Chief of the Imperial General Staff, Lieut. Gen. Sir Robert Hadden Haining, had been sent to the Middle East on military administrative duty -- another step, presumably, in a far-reaching overhaul of Great Britain's Middle East Command.
abstract: Sent to Middle East on administrative duty

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
